letters.description: Conducting a comprehensive review of medical history, environmental exposures, and mental-emotional well-being.
Utilizing functional inquiry and clinical data to identify the underlying triggers of physiological dysfunction.
Developing a personalized care plan that bridges conventional medicine with evidence-based complementary therapies.
Tailoring nutrition, circadian rhythm, and physical activity protocols to the individual's unique biochemical needs.
Implementing nervous system regulation and stress-management techniques to facilitate the body's innate healing response.
Establishing sustainable maintenance protocols and self-efficacy habits for long-term health optimization.
